channel.description: Recent content in Jenkins on Henrik Sommerfeld's blog

item.title: Using Same Node in Jenkins Groovy Pipeline
item.description: As new to Jenkins, I made a mistake that led to confusing errors. Working with .groovy files in Jenkins shared libraries isn’t the most joyful experience I’ve had in my career, but this makes total sense once I saw the obvious.
